fedge("bar",drf{root{arg{0}}},locked,locked).
fedge("bar",drf{root{arg{0}}},unlocked,unlocked).
fedge("bar",drf{root{arg{1}}},unlocked,unlocked).
fedge("bar",drf{root{arg{1}}},locked,error).
fedge("bar",drf{root{arg{1}}},locked,locked).
fedge("bar",drf{root{arg{0}}},locked,error).
fedge("baz",drf{root{arg{1}}},locked,error).
fedge("baz",drf{root{arg{1}}},unlocked,unlocked).
fedge("baz",drf{root{arg{0}}},locked,unlocked).
fedge("baz",drf{root{arg{0}}},unlocked,unlocked).
fedge("baz",drf{root{arg{0}}},locked,locked).
fedge("baz",drf{root{arg{1}}},locked,locked).
fedge("baz",drf{root{arg{1}}},unlocked,locked).
fedge("baz",drf{root{arg{0}}},locked,error).
fedge("baz",drf{root{arg{0}}},unlocked,error).
fedge("foo",drf{root{arg{0}}},locked,error).
fedge("foo",drf{root{arg{0}}},unlocked,unlocked).
